how does grsecurity compare to rsbac?: it was like the original before selinux came around and linus blessed it
i've been using grsecurity for almost as long as it's existed, so i suppose i'm a little biased. :)

selinux and grsecurity have diffrent methods, though. selinux is about containing damage and access during a successful compromise. grsecurity is about both preventing an application exploit from functioning _and_ containing damage after a successful compromise.
apt is the whole system.  aptitude is an app for it
and aptitude doesn't have super-cow powers, apt-get does
